description:
Koushi plays lifeguard on duty as the dorm’s beach vacation continues. Back at home, he takes a trip into the cosplay closet with Frey.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: L`océan vu par Sutea / Kôshi se lance dans le cosplay en studio
Sutea Ponders About the Sea / Koushi Makes His Cosplay Debut
Sutea, Umi ni Omou / Koushi, Cosplay Debut Suru
Suteia denkt am Meer nach / Koushi gibt sein Cosplay-Debüt
すてあ, 海に思う / 孝士, コスプレデビューする
